722568f-b.text:

Pike S44D:, east side, north from South Street, to and including
Cherry Street. Also shown is Pike Street, (a continuation of

to and including Division Streets. The view shows on the left,
the Manhattan Bridge Anchorage.
July 25, 1931.

723329f-a.title: Manhattan: South Street - Pike Slip
723329f-a.text:
South Street, west from (No. 236), but not including Pike Slip, show-
ing prominently (white structure), the Hearst Publications Building extending
from Market to Catherine Slips, and (left), the fronts of Piers 31, 3O and 29,
East River. Also shown (background), is a portion of the Brooklyn Bridge
and (left to right), The Farmer's Loan and Trust Co. Building, the 60 Wall
Street Tower (under construction), and the Bank of Manhattan Co. Building.
July 25, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO RERRODUCTIONS.

July 25, 1931.

723330f-a.text:
South Street, south side, at the foot of Pike Slip,
showing oyster barges under the Manhattan Bridge. These

April 1, 1937
